articles.title: Bangkok named Asia's most visited city for 2025
articles.summary: Bangkok is Asia's most visited city for 2025, praised for its culture, food, and safety. Thailand actively promotes tourism with campaigns.

articles.title: Southeast Asia's second largest economy vows better safety after Malaysian pair torched
articles.summary: Thailand boosts tourist safety in Bangkok after two Malaysians were set on fire. The incident impacts the country's tourism image.

articles.title: Chinese track star Wu Yanni not satisfied after defending national 100m hurdles title
articles.summary: Chinese track star Wu Yanni won the national 100m hurdles title but was dissatisfied with her 13.15-second performance. She vows to improve and is eligible for the Tokyo World Athletics Championships.

articles.title: Which Southeast Asian country named world's second cheapest destination?
articles.summary: Indonesia is the 2nd cheapest travel destination for US tourists, Thailand the cheapest, and Iceland the most expensive per a study.

articles.title: World's 'second most beautiful island' among most searched destinations for National Day holiday
articles.summary: Phu Quoc, Vietnam's "second most beautiful island," is a top National Day holiday destination. It saw a 31.8% visitor increase and 93% revenue growth.
articles.location: Phu Quoc, Hanoi, Da Nang, Da Lat, Vietnam

articles.title: Pfizer's strategy to support Vietnam's national healthcare transformation
articles.summary: Pfizer aids Vietnam's healthcare transformation, focusing on innovative vaccines, treatments, preventive care, and expanded access.

articles.title: Investments that help basketball legend Magic Johnson become billionaire
articles.summary: Magic Johnson, an NBA legend, built a billion-dollar empire through strategic investments in diverse sectors, far beyond his basketball earnings.

articles.title: Neighbor installs air conditioner blasting heat into my bedroom in privacy dispute
articles.summary: A homeowner faces a dispute after a neighbor installed an AC unit blowing hot air into their bedroom over a window. The neighbor insists the window invades privacy, despite legal compliance. This unresolved conflict causes stress, leading the homeowner to consider selling.

articles.title: Asia's 'most loved country' receives nearly 1.8 million Chinese in 5 months
articles.summary: Malaysia attracted 1.8M Chinese tourists due to an extended visa-free policy. It targets 7M visitors next year using social media.

articles.title: Can Vietnam tourism catch up with Thailand's after sweeping visa reforms?
articles.summary: Vietnam's visa reforms aim for 25-30M tourists by 2026, nearing Thailand. Infrastructure, service, and marketing are key for success.

articles.title: All 34 Vietnamese cities, provinces to stage fireworks for National Day
articles.summary: Vietnam's National Day on Sept 2 will feature celebrations in 34 cities, including fireworks. A military parade will mark the 80th August Revolution anniversary. Events aim to inspire the public.

articles.title: PSG dominate list of men's Ballon D'Or nominees
articles.summary: PSG dominates 2025 Ballon d'Or nominees, excluding past winners like Rodri, Messi, Ronaldo. Winner announced Sep 22.

articles.title: World’s fourth richest man Jeff Bezos seeks $190,000 legal fees from wife Lauren Sanchez’s brother in ongoing court battle
articles.summary: Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sanchez seek legal fees from her brother in a defamation suit, following their controversial Venice wedding.

articles.title: Foreign national arrested in HCMC over fake BTS traffic fine scam
articles.summary: HCMC police arrested a foreigner for a fake BTS scam, sending false traffic fines to steal data. Public warned about phishing links.

articles.title: Indonesia's Pink Beach named world's most beautiful by travel experts
articles.summary: Indonesia's Pink Beach on Komodo Island was named the world's most beautiful. It features rosé-hued sands and rich marine life, perfect for snorkeling. May-October is the best time to visit.
articles.location: Pink Beach on Komodo Island, Indonesia

articles.title: Airfares surge during National Day holidays
articles.summary: Airfares for Vietnam's National Day holidays surged. Hanoi hotels are nearly full for the military parade, impacting travel costs nationwide.
articles.location: Hanoi, HCMC, Da Nang, Phu Quoc Island, Vietnam

articles.title: 80 years since the August Revolution: Landmark sites that shaped Vietnam's path to independence
articles.summary: Key sites in Hanoi, Hue, and Ho Chi Minh City mark Vietnam's 1945 August Revolution, crucial for independence.
articles.location: Hanoi, Hue, and Ho Chi Minh City

articles.title: ChatGPT defeats Grok 4 to win chess tournament for AI
articles.summary: ChatGPT's o3 model won the first AI chess tournament, defeating Grok 4. The tournament was organized by Google with 8 AIs competing.

articles.title: Son Heung-min confused by request to help US win World Cup
articles.summary: Son Heung-min joins LAFC. A council member confused him by asking to help the U.S. win the World Cup. This viral gaffe caused a stir.

articles.title: Vietnamese engineers win first prize at Global AI Challenge
articles.summary: Vietnamese engineers won gold at a global AI challenge in Hong Kong for an energy-saving model. This innovation optimizes cooling demand for buildings.

articles.title: All-you-can-eat Japanese buffet to close in Singapore after 9 years
articles.summary: Japanese buffet Shaburi & Kintan closes Singapore outlet. Rising costs and reduced spending cause F&B closures.

articles.title: Relaxed visa policies, increased flight connectivity benefit hotel industry
articles.summary: Vietnam's hospitality thrives due to visa relaxations, more flights, and infrastructure. Occupancy and revenue per room show significant increases.

articles.title: Luxury hotels in world's 2nd largest economy struggle to survive amid tightened travel spending
articles.summary: Chinese luxury hotels face revenue drops from reduced spending. They resort to selling street food to survive amid China's deflationary risks.

articles.title: Watchmaker Swatch apologizes for 'slanted eye' ad after online backlash in China
articles.summary: Swatch apologized for a racist "slanted eye" ad in China, removing it. It caused backlash, impacting sales.

articles.title: Bangkok named best city for Gen Z
articles.summary: Bangkok ranks as the top city for Gen Z globally. Its appeal stems from affordability, community, and nightlife. Melbourne, Cape Town, NYC, and Copenhagen also followed.
articles.location: Bangkok, Melbourne, Cape Town, New York City, Copenhagen

articles.title: Court to court: Why Vietnam tennis players are switching to pickleball
articles.summary: Vietnamese tennis players increasingly switch to pickleball for financial gain, impacting the national team. Federation boosts youth support.

articles.title: Two Japanese fighters on same card die from brain injuries
articles.summary: Two Japanese boxers died from brain injuries after separate fights on the same card in Tokyo. Both underwent operations for subdural haematoma, highlighting the sport's risks.

articles.title: EV market attractive to both domestic, foreign manufacturers
articles.summary: Vietnam's EV market booms, drawing domestic and foreign investment. Companies expand production. Predicted $6.7B market by 2030.
